resources.string: Application is registered to system watchdog service.
Application is registered to application watchdog service.
Application is not registered to any watchdog service.

When an application is registered to the system watchdog service, the device will reboot the system when malfunction is detected in the subscribed application. This happens when application stops refreshing the watchdog service within the configured timeout.\n\nYou can use the \'Report Failure\' button to force application failure.

When an application is registered to the application watchdog service, the device will stop the subscribed application when malfunction is detected and the passed PendingIntent will be executed. This happens when application stops refreshing the watchdog service within the configured timeout.

In this case, the application will be restarted if the 'Restart application' check box is selected.

You can use the 'Report Failure' button to force application failure.
